help_about_items.learn: If you want to learn more about this Identity Manager and how to use it, take a look at the links below:
help_about_items.installing: Complete documentation for installing, administrating and using the Identity Manager in ReadTheDocs
help_about_items.source: Source code of the project in GitHub
help_about_items.missed_tours: Missed one of the tours? Want to take them again? This is the complete list of tours that will guide you from the basics of this Identity Manager to some of the most advanced features.
help_about_items.basic_tour: Basics Tour: get to know the Welcome page.
help_about_items.profile_tour: Profile Tour: edit your personal data and set up an avatar.
help_about_items.app_tour: Applications Tour: create your first application.
help_about_items.roles_tour: Roles & Permissions Tour: learn more about roles and permissions inside apps, and how to authorize other users and organizations in them.
help_about_items.organizations_tour: Organizations Tour: create your first organization and take a look at its home page.

notify.subject: Subject
notify.write_user_ids_message: Need to write some user ids

authorize_pop_up.title: Manage Administrators
authorize_pop_up.use_filter_message: Use the filter (type at least two characters).
authorize_pop_up.no_role_assigned_message: Some users don't have any role assigned. If you save now they won't be authorized in the application

create_pop_up.title: Create user
create_pop_up.password_not_match: The two password fields didn't match.
create_pop_up.send_user_email_input: Send an email to the user
create_pop_up.send_user_email_popover: This will send an email to the user including the assigned password.

delete_pop_up.title: Delete user
delete_pop_up.message_1: You are going to delete these users:
delete_pop_up.message_2: Are you sure? Deleting users implies the deletion of all their resources. This action is permanent.

reset_pass_pop_up.title: Change password
reset_pass_pop_up.password_not_match: The two password fields didn't match.
